useCase.name: Save New History Data
useCase.description: User submits new history data via the UI.

mainSequence.step: User submits new history data via the UI.
Forward new history data to HistoryRouter.
Link new data with the appropriate handler in HistoryController.
Create new History object in the HistoryRepository.
Call save() method and execute the record creation on the Database.
Confirmation that the saved History is being linked back into with dispatcher layer.
Return success directive to the User regarding the saved History object.
The success message is displayed on the interface seen by the User.
